text: I just noticed these appearing when I did a pull from the design tools earlier today! First I'd seen it, so I don't know if there's any docs for it.
<@U3A4KEWK1> Did you pull from a newly-created portal, or have these been added to default modules in existing portals as well?
<@U04AQA0QM8E> Added to existing portals and modules.
Just do an `hs fetfch` and you should see them appear. :slightly_smiling_face:

Can a module that's in a theme not be used in a legacy drag-and-drop template (even if that template is part of the theme)? I've got an old template here (in a theme that's got some old stuff grandfathered in) that I want to add a new module to, but it's just appearing in the list - in the design tools or in the page editor (for the flexible column).

<@U3A4KEWK1> Yeah, no docs on them yet, most likely a beta or in-development thing they’re working on. They seem to test stuff on live for some reason sometimes, and I’ve been told not to talk about stuff like this in the past until they have public docs for it, but I don’t really get that. If you don’t want people to see or talk about stuff, don’t push it to public or make it publicly usable. v_v
